alert.note: Alert for Barber; Clark; Comanche; Meade; Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 04 at 2:51PM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Late Today And Saturday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 081...087... 088...089 AND 090... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning For wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM CST Saturday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 081 Pratt...Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade...Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark...Fire Weather Zone 089 Comanche and Fire Weather Zone 090 Barber. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
